userinterface

Class GUIPrism

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • userinterface.GUIPrism
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GUIPrism
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    PRISM Graphical User Interface This class is the top level class for the PRISM GUI. It acts as a container for GUIPlugin objects. The method getPluginArray() is defined to allow any class that implements this interface to be added to the user interface. The aim of this is to make transferral between different versions of the system easier. As a top level class, GUIPrism contains some utility methods, that can be used via the GUIPlugin class. This class is also a container of a Prism object, which acts as the link between the user interface and the underlying PRISM code.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIPrism

        public GUIPrism()
         throws GUIException,
                PrismException
        Creates a new instance of GUIPrism. By calling setupResources(), setupPrism() and then initComponents().
        Throws:
        GUIException - Thrown if there is an error in initialising the user interface.
        PrismException

      • getPluginArray

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GUIPlugin> getPluginArray(GUIPrism g)
        Define this method to add plugins to the GUI. Returns an ArrayList of Plugin objects.
        Parameters:
        g - The instance of GUIPrism to associate with the GUIPlugin objects.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of GUIPlugins to be included in the user interface

      • getGUI

        public static GUIPrism getGUI()

      • setupResources

        private void setupResources()
                     throws GUIException
        Sets the URL for images properly, so that they are loaded from the correct directory. This also loads in all of the resouces for internationalization support. Also sets up the file chooser and event handler. Throws a GUIException if there is a problem with the resources.
        Throws:
        GUIException

      • setupPrism

        private void setupPrism()
                 throws PrismException
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • initComponents

        private void initComponents()
                     throws GUIException
        This initialises all of the graphical user interface componenets. The structure of the user interface should be
        • Menu Bar at the Top
        • Toolbar just below
        • Tabs with all of the pluggable "screens"
        • Status Bar at the bottom
        Throws:
        GUIException

      • nextTab

        public void nextTab()
        Moves the view to the next GUIPlugin component which has a tab. If the last one has been reached, this sets the view back to the first one.
